name: Commonwealth ex rel. Butler, Appellant, v. Brierly

parties: Commonwealth ex rel. Butler, Appellant, v. Brierly.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Order affirmed.
Mr. Justice Cohen took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.

casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth ex rel. Butler, Appellant, v. Brierly.
Submitted January 2, 1968.
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones> Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
Thomas A. Butler, appellant, in propria persona.
Tram Nedurian, Jr. and Ralph B. D’lorio, Assistant District Attorneys, William R. Tool, Jr., First Assistant District Attorney, and Stephen J. McEwen, Jr., District Attorney, for appellee.
March 15, 1968:
